analysis_metadata.persona: Junior Level Product & Service Enabling Head

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Use survey system to collect product feedback and drive product improvements
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Highly supportive - need customer feedback for product optimization
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Product feedback integration planning and survey template development

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Integrate survey system with existing core banking and product systems
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Cautious - concerned about system complexity and integration effort
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Technical requirements gathering and integration architecture planning

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Manage service agreements and SLAs for survey system operations
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Supportive - need clear service agreements and SLA management
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: SLA definition and agreement management framework development

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Train staff on survey system usage and product integration capabilities
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Supportive - need comprehensive training materials and programs
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Training program development and user adoption planning

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Ensure survey system integrates smoothly with core banking operations
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Neutral - focused on operational stability and minimal disruption
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Operational impact assessment and integration testing coordination

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Provide technical support for survey system users and troubleshoot issues
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Supportive but concerned - need proper documentation and training
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Support documentation and troubleshooting procedure development

domain_specific_insights.product_integration: Survey system must integrate with existing product management and core banking systems
domain_specific_insights.time_to_market: Fast implementation critical to meet business timeline pressures
domain_specific_insights.service_adoption: User training and support critical for successful adoption across the organization

current_challenges: Slow product feedback collection delays product improvements and time-to-market
No integrated system for collecting customer feedback on banking products and services
Manual survey processes create bottlenecks in product development cycles
Limited ability to measure product adoption and customer satisfaction systematically
Lack of standardized service agreements for customer feedback collection activities
product_services_pain_points: IT delays in implementing custom survey solutions for product teams
Legal bottlenecks when trying to collect customer feedback quickly
Sales pressure for faster product iteration based on customer insights
Acting as firefighter for stuck product launches due to lack of customer feedback

primary_drivers: Launch products faster through systematic customer feedback integration
Ensure adoption through better product-market fit via survey insights
Achieve SLA compliance for customer feedback collection processes
Enable rapid product iteration based on real-time customer input
product_services_drivers: Transform from firefighter to proactive product enabler through systematic feedback
Reduce time-to-market through streamlined customer insight collection
Improve product adoption rates through customer-driven product development
Eliminate IT delays and legal bottlenecks through standardized survey platform

high_level_objectives: Reduce product feedback collection time from months to weeks
Achieve 90% product adoption rate through survey-informed product development
Maintain SLA compliance <48 hours for survey deployment requests
Enable time-to-market <6 months for new products through continuous feedback
product_services_kpis: Time-to-market <6 months maintained through faster customer feedback loops
Product adoption improvement through survey-informed product optimization
SLA compliance achievement for survey system operations and support
Fast product launch enablement through systematic customer insight integration

scope_in: Integration with core banking systems for customer data and product information
Product feedback survey templates and workflows for systematic collection
Service level agreement management for survey system operations
User training and adoption programs for survey system usage
Technical support and troubleshooting procedures for survey system
Agreement management integration for survey service contracts
Product manager self-service capabilities for survey creation and deployment
Core banking integration APIs and data synchronization
scope_out: Custom core banking system modifications beyond standard APIs
Advanced product analytics and business intelligence platform development
Complex product lifecycle management system integration
Advanced agreement management platform features beyond survey needs
assumptions: Core banking systems have accessible APIs for customer and product data
Product managers have capacity for survey system training and adoption
IT integration teams have bandwidth for survey system implementation
Existing service agreement frameworks can accommodate survey system SLAs
Product training infrastructure can support survey system training materials
Service desk has capacity to support additional survey system user queries
constraints: Cannot modify core banking system architecture beyond approved integration points
Must maintain existing service level agreements and operational standards
Integration must not disrupt existing product development and launch processes
Implementation timeline must align with business pressure for fast delivery
Training programs limited by existing product training team capacity
Support procedures must integrate with existing service desk operations

product_services_considerations.integration_complexity: Survey system must integrate seamlessly with complex product factory systems
product_services_considerations.delivery_timeline: Fast implementation critical to meet competitive time-to-market pressures
product_services_considerations.adoption_success: Comprehensive training and support critical for user adoption and system value

existing_processes.product_feedback_collection: Manual feedback collection through external platforms and email surveys
existing_processes.product_development_integration: No systematic integration of customer feedback into product development
existing_processes.service_agreement_management: Manual SLA tracking for product-related services
existing_processes.user_training: Basic training on existing systems without survey-specific capabilities
existing_processes.technical_support: General IT support without survey system expertise

current_system_landscape.core_banking_systems: Existing systems with limited API integration for external survey platforms
current_system_landscape.product_management_tools: Separate product management systems without survey integration
current_system_landscape.agreement_management: Basic agreement tracking without survey service SLA management
current_system_landscape.training_platforms: Existing training infrastructure without survey system content

manual_activities: Manual creation and deployment of product feedback surveys
Hand-compiled analysis of customer feedback for product teams
Manual tracking of survey-related service agreements and SLAs
Case-by-case user training on survey tools and procedures
Manual troubleshooting of survey system issues and user queries
duplications_identified: Multiple product teams creating similar customer feedback surveys
Repeated integration efforts for connecting surveys with product data
Duplicate training materials for different survey tools and platforms
Redundant support procedures across different product areas

product_delivery_limitations.feedback_integration: Limited ability to integrate customer feedback into product development cycles
product_delivery_limitations.time_to_market_impact: Manual feedback processes slow down product iteration and launch timelines
product_delivery_limitations.adoption_measurement: No systematic way to measure and improve product adoption through customer insights

operational_inefficiencies: Product managers spend excessive time on manual feedback collection instead of product development
IT integration teams repeatedly handle similar survey integration requests
Service desk handles survey-related issues without standardized procedures
competitive_implications: Slower product iteration compared to competitors with integrated feedback systems
Limited ability to respond quickly to customer needs and market changes
Reduced product success rates due to lack of systematic customer input

key_insights_for_designer: Integration-first design approach required with comprehensive core banking system connectivity
Fast delivery timeline critical to meet business pressure for quick time-to-market
User adoption and training programs essential for system success and value realization
Service level agreement management and support procedures must be built-in from launch
domain_specific_requirements: Product & Service Enabling KPI alignment (time-to-market <6 months, product adoption, SLA compliance)
Comprehensive core banking and product system integration for seamless operations
Fast implementation approach to meet competitive delivery pressures
Complete training and support framework for successful user adoption and system utilization

quality_validation.stakeholder_coverage: Complete - all product and service enabling roles identified
quality_validation.problem_statement_clarity: Clear product delivery and integration pain points defined
quality_validation.scope_boundaries: Well-defined with product and service constraints
quality_validation.as_is_documentation: Comprehensive analysis of current product and service limitations
